newsitem.title: USA: IBM Corp may issue 100-year bond debt.
newsitem.headline: IBM Corp may issue 100-year bond debt.

text.p: IBM Corp is expected to issue a 100-year debt offering via lead underwriter Salomon Brothers Inc, high-grade syndicate sources said on Tuesday.
The size of the IBM deal is expected to total between $500 and $600 million, sources said.
Price talk on the issue is seen in the high 70 basis points over U.S. Treasuries arena, sources added.
